topic.title: How peer 2 peer deployment feature works
topic.shortdesc: How the peer 2 peer feature works

ul.li: To reduce bandwidth between central server and the computer (useful in the case of a remote site)
The first client downloads the fragments of a package from the central server.

body.p: During a deployment on several machines located on the same site, you can see a significant improvement in bandwidth usage.
body.note: With the P2P feature you can e.g. avoid having local server with synchronization to a remote master server. Etc. In this case you can start automated application deployment without changing the architecture of an already present network.
